name: Life (DirtyBug)
description:
Ruperth is a main character,he is a pure soul who want to discover everything that life can offer him.
He doesn't know that life can be not so fair sometimes.
Will you help him to go 

through life and find his love of a life,cuz Ruperth know that meaning of a life is to love and to be loved.
Game has 2 endings good and bad ending,its up to you which one you wanna choose.
Avoid:
-depression
-anxiety
-stress
-problems

-This is my first game made in gdevelop 5.

-Dontation that i'll appreciate alot and it will help me buy better pc for developing more games:
